concept.description: Labels functional interfaces (i.e. to be used as lambda expressions) with `FunctionalInterface`.
concept.cypher: MATCH (i:Java:Interface)-[:DECLARES]->(m:Member:Java:Method {abstract: true}) WITH i, count(m) AS methods WHERE methods = 1 SET i:FunctionalInterface RETURN i AS FunctionInterface

concept.description: Labels default methods of interfaces with `Default`.
concept.cypher: MATCH (type:Type:Java:Interface)-[:DECLARES]->(defaultMethod:Java:Method) WHERE NOT exists(defaultMethod.abstract) SET defaultMethod:Default RETURN defaultMethod AS DefaultMethod, type AS Interface

concept.description: Labels lambda methods with `Lambda` and creates a relation `DECLARES` from the declaring method.
concept.cypher: MATCH (type:Type)-[:DECLARES]->(lambda:Method) WHERE exists(lambda.synthetic) and exists(lambda.static) and lambda.name starts with("lambda$") SET lambda:Lambda WITH type, lambda MATCH (type)-[:DECLARES]->(method:Method) WHERE method <> lambda and method.firstLineNumber <= lambda.firstLineNumber and method.lastLineNumber >= lambda.lastLineNumber MERGE (method)-[:DECLARES]->(lambda) RETURN method, collect(lambda)
